tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE cancer_patients (
  patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(255),
  diagnosis VARCHAR(255),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  genetic_variation UUID,
  treatment_plan TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
    patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(100),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    diagnosis TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE genomic_data (
    data_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id UUID,
    dna_sequence TEXT,
    report_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patients(patient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Patients (
  patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  date_of_birth DATE
)

CREATE TABLE Samples (
  sample_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id UUID REFERENCES Patients(patient_id),
  sample_type VARCHAR(50),
  collection_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE GenomicData (
  data_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  sample_id UUID REFERENCES Samples(sample_id),
  sequencing_method VARCHAR(50),
  mutation_analysis JSONB
)

CREATE TABLE Treatments (
  treatment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id UUID REFERENCES Patients(patient_id),
  treatment_name VARCHAR(100),
  treatment_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE patients (
  patient_id INT,
  patient_name VARCHAR(100),
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  age INT,
  diagnosis VARCHAR(100),
  PRIMARY KEY (patient_id)
)

CREATE TABLE genetic_results (
  result_id INT,
  patient_id INT,
  gene_name VARCHAR(50),
  mutation_type VARCHAR(50),
  mutation_impact VARCHAR(50),
  PRIMARY KEY (result_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patients(patient_id)
)

CREATE TABLE treatments (
  treatment_id INT,
  patient_id INT,
  treatment_type VARCHAR(50),
  treatment_start_date DATE,
  treatment_end_date DATE,
  PRIMARY KEY (treatment_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patients(patient_id)
)

CREATE TABLE drug_interactions (
  interaction_id INT,
  treatment_id INT,
  interaction_description TEXT,
  PRIMARY KEY (interaction_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (treatment_id) REFERENCES treatments(treatment_id)
)

CREATE TABLE doctors (
  doctor_id INT,
  doctor_name VARCHAR(100),
  specialization VARCHAR(50),
  hospital_name VARCHAR(100),
  PRIMARY KEY (doctor_id)
)
